name: Yellow Cake
description:
"The only game where you can flirt with an incapacitated bodyguard... guaranteed!"

A comedic and light-hearted real-time stealth tactics game where a family of spies are on a mission to retrieve an important document from a Russian scientist's villa.

Whether you choose to be "one with the shadows" or a bunch of frying-pan-flinging cylindrical sleuths is up to you! But remember, you won't succeed unless you make use of each character's unique abilities and work together as a team.

Controls:

Move (Run) - WASD
Stealth (Walk) - Left Shift (Hold)

Note: Enemies can hear your footsteps, so move quietly around them!

Camera Pan - Mouse
Interact - E
Ability - Space
Distraction - Q
Character Cycle - TAB
Select Mr. Hitman - 1
Select Mrs. Rogue - 2
Select Baby Scout - 3
Pause - Esc

Note: Volume and SFX sliders do not work in this build. There are also a few gameplay bugs and incomplete features, so if you run into problems, it likely isn't working as intended which we can only apologise for.

We'd love honest feedback though - the more robust, the better - so please let us know your experiences in the comments!

Yellow Cake OST: https://soundcloud.com/grant-holzhauer/sets/yellow-cake-ost
